code: import{SET_GAME}from'../actions/gameActions';var INITIAL_STATE={timer:0,finalAnswer:''};var gameReducer=function gameReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_STATE;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_GAME:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default gameReducer;
